snippet: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s party said Thursday that it was negotiating with the government to change the oath of office for lawmakers because it contravened the party’s official platform.
abstract: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi's party says that it is negotiating with the Myanmar government to change the oath of office for lawmakers because it contravenes the party's official platform.
lead_paragraph: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s party said Thursday that it was negotiating with the government to change the oath of office for lawmakers because it contravened the party’s official platform.

headline.main: Myanmar: Dispute Over Oath of Office
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Dispute Over Oath of Office
